title: Chapter 604 - The Wilds! The Profound Sky Realm
volume_title: A Sword Suppresses Thirty Thousand Years
body:
Chapter 604 - The Wilds! The Profound Sky Realm

Su Yi looked at Qing Shuang and said, “Where are you from?”

Qing Shuang hesitated, unsure of whether or not she should answer him.

“The Wilds, the Profound Sky Realm,” said the dignified voice from the other end of the spatial tunnel.

The Wilds! 

Su Yi’s pupils subtly constricted.

This was his first time hearing the name “the Wilds” from a stranger’s mouth since his reincarnation.

Although his heart was as firm as a boulder, he couldn’t help but feel a bit dazed.

In the Wilds, there existed nine provinces.

Furthermore, its territories encompassed and protected thirty-three other worlds and planes. 

The Profound Sky Realm was one of them!

The Profound Sky Realm was nearest to the northernmost province of the Wilds, the Northern Snow Province. It and five other worlds were collectively known as the...
original_title: Chapter 604 - The Wilds! The Profound Sky Realm
